nodes.bodyText:
Hi, @JimSuplizio ,
Could you please review this file change?
No logic change, just:

Remote reduantant whitespace. It's removed by Intellij automically.
Fix the order to 'a, b, c, d.'
Fix the error in the message.

You can check each commit for easier review.
(cc @saragluna , FYI.)
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -11,9 +11,9 @@
 # 2. There are no duplicate entries in the external_dependencies.txt file

nodes.bodyText: I'm fine with the 'a,b,c,d' correction, thank you. These extra spaces are the result of VS Code's formatting and while it seems to have gotten better the if/else begin/end braces still sometimes end up with an extra space at the end.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -11,9 +11,9 @@
 # 2. There are no duplicate entries in the external_dependencies.txt file

nodes.bodyText:
@JimSuplizio ,
Thank you for your response. 🙇

These extra spaces are the result of VS Code's formatting

We  can configure VS Code to remove trailing space: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/30884131/remove-trailing-spaces-automatically-or-with-a-shortcut
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -11,9 +11,9 @@
 # 2. There are no duplicate entries in the external_dependencies.txt file

nodes.bodyText: @chenrujun thanks for pointing that out. I'll get "files.trimTrailingWhitespace": true added to my local config.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -11,9 +11,9 @@
 # 2. There are no duplicate entries in the external_dependencies.txt file
